answers.answer: Dear Sleeping Beauty,As far as your concerns, it is an illegal drug and against the law. Therefore, we can't promote the use of an illegal drug. Sorry, bret

These are the same receptors that marijuana stimulates.  The first few paragraphs should answer your questions.  If you want more detailed info, click on the 'take course now' button at the bottom of the pagehttp://www.ecsimpact.com/

question: Two days ago I made a post regarding Marijuana use and diabetes...a personal issue I am currently facing.I longed for some opinions to give me some assistance, but my return to the forum only saddened me further to see that my post was removed.Why ?
title: WHY Was My Post Deleted ?
